alert.note: Alert for Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 11:04AM PST until January 14 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 to 30 below zero through Saturday and 10 to 20 below zero through Sunday morning. * WHERE...Methow, Loup Loup Pass, Conconully, Winthrop, Twisp, and Mazama. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
